explains: adj. 相合的，一致的；（图形）全等的，叠合的

sentences.en: They want to work in an organization whose values are congruent with their own.
sentences.cn: 他们想在一家与他们自己的价值观相同的组织里工作。

sentences.en: If you want to succeed, you must be congruent.
sentences.cn: 假如你想要成功，那你一定要始终如一。

sentences.en: Congruent with statements of other Andromedan contactees.
sentences.cn: 与其他仙女星人接触者的报告相一致。
